node.title: Boil water notice after heavy rain in Timaru
node.description: About 2500 Timaru households are on a boil water notice following heavy rain in the region.
node.content:
["About 2500 Timaru households are on a boil water notice following heavy rain in the region.", "", "
\nPhoto: 123RF\n
", "Due to high levels of silt in the water, a notice is in place for the Downlands and Te Moana rural water schemes.", "Residents are being asked to boil their water for a least one minute before drinking, cooking and brushing teeth.", "Upgrade works for these two water systems are planned."]
